meanings.definition: A body of permeable rock that can contain or transmit groundwater.
meanings.sent1: The aquifer beneath the ground stores water for the town.
meanings.sent2: Farmers rely on the aquifer for irrigation.
meanings.sent3: The aquifer must be shy because it hides all the water!
meanings.sent4: The aquifer is like a hidden treasure chest full of water.
meanings.sent5: The aquifer is a secret underground reservoir of life-giving water.

meanings.definition: An underground layer of water-bearing rock.
meanings.sent1: The workers drilled into the aquifer to access clean water.
meanings.sent2: The aquifer supplies water to the entire city.
meanings.sent3: The aquifer must be a magician, making water appear out of nowhere!
meanings.sent4: The aquifer is the heart of the earth, pumping life-giving water.
meanings.sent5: The aquifer is a hidden oasis beneath our feet.
